meanings.definition: A flat, usually square piece of material on which other parts are placed or built.
meanings.sent1: The construction worker carefully placed the baseplates on the ground before assembling the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic secured the baseplates to the floor before installing the heavy machinery.
meanings.sent3: The baseplates decided to have a race to see who could hold the most weight without breaking.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of sturdy baseplates, supporting everything without faltering.
meanings.sent5: The baseplates gleamed under the sunlight, showcasing their strength and reliability.

meanings.definition: The bottom support of a structure or machine.
meanings.sent1: The baseplates of the table kept it steady even on uneven ground.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the baseplates of the crane before lifting any heavy loads.
meanings.sent3: The baseplates threw a party for all the other parts of the machine to show their importance.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was the baseplates of his life, providing stability and strength.
meanings.sent5: The baseplates anchored the entire structure, ensuring it stood firm against any force.

meanings.definition: The part of a piece of equipment that connects it to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The baseplates of the satellite dish were securely fastened to the roof.
meanings.sent2: Before starting the generator, make sure the baseplates are properly aligned with the ground.
meanings.sent3: The baseplates were tired of always being stepped on and decided to go on strike.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as the baseplates, grounding him and keeping him connected to reality.
meanings.sent5: The baseplates clung to the surface, refusing to let go even in the face of strong winds.
